TopicTitle: Top tier buildings give you 1 star Kerbonaughts.

Articles.Content: Just thinking, if we have the astronaut complex fully upgraded, it would make all our pilots level 1, R&D 1star scientists, and the VAB 1 star engineers. It makes sense in my head, for some reason. What do you folks think?

I like it! A prestigious organisation should attract only the top recruits. Although I kinda think this should be tied to more than just one building, maybe even all of them.

I imagine this would be an even better idea when we get more skills for all the jobs.

Just yesterday I was thinking of something very much along those lines.

Tier 4 R&D: all newly hired scientists start at 1 star.

Tier 4 VAB: all new engineers start at 1 star.

Tier 4 Tracking: all new pilots start at 1 star.

Tier 4 Astronaut complex: all crew can be trained up to 1 star.

The same for tier 5 but now 2 star instead of 1.
